name: Interballistic Symphony
description:
Interballistic Symphony is a musical, fast-paced indie game all about speed and swift thinking.
Easy to learn, hard to master, interballistic features several levels set in galactic and cold, unforgiving environments.
Navigate through various obstacles and see how far you can make it.
Featuring a normal mode and a marathon mode for more casual gameplay and endless mode with highscore lists for competitive players.



Several EDM soundtracks.
Normal mode. Go from point A to point B.
Marathon mode. Multiple levels put together and speed being a more important factor than normal mode.
Endless mode. See how far you can make it, while the speed increase over time.
Powerups such as slowmotion, low gravity and score boosts to help you through tricky obstacles and reach new heights.
Set and save public highscores in endless mode.
Discover collectibles, unlock a bunch of achievements and push your skills to the limit.
